item.title: AGI and existential risk
item.description: “The Creator” is the latest AI blockbuster sensation to grace our screens this year. In it we are introduced to a future where AI robots and “simulants” are a more compassionate and peaceful version of their human counterparts and have to fight for their freedom and defeat american imperialism. Although the film is visually stunning with impressive photography and special effects, the story telling is superficial, with poor character development and an unoriginal scenario imo.
